data.name: NeverEverLand
data.detailed_description:
NeverEverLand is a fairytale-esque horror game which offers a cute, yet dark experience. You play as a bright-eyed girl living in a cursed town. Whenever the bells ring, a townsperson loses their sanity and turns into a monster. Some will live, some will die; some will turn into monsters, and some might get a happy ending. Your morals will be tested, and your actions can save people. That is, if you can save yourself...

Engaging puzzles:

Decipher braille notes to pass through the blind man’s room, or piece together a ghost’s final memories to help them pass onto the afterlife. NeverEverLand is filled with memorable and interesting puzzles

Make Friends With the Townspeople:

Share spooky campfire stories, celebrate Halloween, have sleepovers, and more!

Watch Your Friends Die:

Throughout the story, numerous characters will turn into monsters, die, or both. With NeverEverLand's branching choices, routes, and endings, you never know who's turn will be next

A Beautiful, Eerie World:

Enjoy the magical sights, enjoy being a magical sight to that monster behind you. From haunted houses, to enchanted wonderlands, the world has much to see and do, and rewards players for exploring it

data.short_description: Explore a cursed forest, make friends, and then watch them die.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

content_descriptors.notes: While used sparingly, NeverEverLand contains mature content such as: violence, gore, suicide, mature language, and alcohol / drug usage
